## ScreenReaderClient.once() method

Registers a one-time listener for the `message` event, that will be called the next time a message is received from the screen reader.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
once(event: "message", listener: (message: string) => void): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | "message" | "message" |
|  listener | (message: string) =&gt; void | function to be called with the received message<!-- -->The listener can removed with [ScreenReaderClient.off()](./assistive-playwright-client.screenreaderclient.off.md)<!-- -->. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this
